trans-unit.source: Using the Network Server with preexisting <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> applications

seg-source.mrk: Using the Network Server with preexisting <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> applications

target.mrk: Using the Network Server with preexisting <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> applications

trans-unit.source: You must modify Java applications that currently run against <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in embedded mode so that they work with the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server.

seg-source.mrk: You must modify Java applications that currently run against <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in embedded mode so that they work with the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server.

target.mrk: You must modify Java applications that currently run against <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in embedded mode so that they work with the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server.

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section discuss these changes.
